Project.name: SmartRent Lock
Project.scenes: Door Lock Scene (App),Door Lock Scene Ex(App)

TextElement.Str:
Volume up - Lock
Volume down - Unlock

WebElement.Str: Loading

<html>
<head>
<style>
@font-face {
  font-family: 'CrushMine';
  src: url('file:///storage/emulated/0/Tasker/fonts/Crush%20Mine.otf');
}

html, body {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: black;
}

/* Static button */
button {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 0;
  font-family: 'CrushMine', sans-serif;
  font-size: 36px;
  color: white;
  background: linear-gradient(145deg, #440000, #990000);
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 10px #ff0000, 0 0 25px #ff0000;

  /* Disable ALL interaction visuals */
  transition: none;
  outline: none;
  user-select: none;
  -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  touch-action: manipulation;
}

button:focus,
button:active {
  outline: none;
  background: linear-gradient(145deg, #440000, #990000);
}
</style>

<script>
function pressLock() {
  window.location.href = "lock";
}
</script>
</head>
<body>
<button onclick="pressLock()">Lock</button>
</body>
</html>

  box-shadow: inset 0 0 10px #00ff00, 0 0 25px #00ff00;

  /* Disable ALL interaction visuals */
  transition: none;
  outline: none;
  user-select: none;
  -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;

button:focus,

</style>

<script>
function pressUnlock() {
  window.location.href = "unlock";
}
</script>
</head>
<body>
<button onclick="pressUnlock()">Unlock</button>
</body>
</html>
